title: Assessment of biometrics and stress indicators of the adult Village Weaver birds (Ploceus cucullatus) during breeding and post-breeding seasons in Jos, Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Felix A. Andong, Vincent C. Ejere, Onyinyechukwu A. Agina, Samuel O. Ekere, Ezekiel S. Mayowa
